record.title: ORDER FOR MORNING BUSINESS
record.narrative:
ORDER FOR MORNING BUSINESS -- (Senate - November 17, 2008)

[Page: S10535]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, following my remarks and the remarks of Senator McConnell, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to a period of morning business with Senators allowed to speak for up to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
